AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.ten undocumented aliens: undocumented immigrants discovered at the immigration checkpoint stop, hidden in the tractor-trailer's sleeper area, testified against Ramon De La Cruz
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz: defendant arguing about the thirty-day exclusion period and its impact on the Speedy Trial Act violation, wore a blinking cellular Bluetooth Device and white clothing during the incident
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Zeba Williams: co-defendant of Ramon De La Cruz, also requesting continuances, rode with Ramon De La Cruz in the tractor-trailer
